h2_title: Where to Find the Green-Capped Martialist
content: This secret spot can be found by going right down the hill from the Forest of Felicity and down to the end of the Brook of Bliss' stream.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Green-Capped Martialist'.
The content is as follows:
This secret spot can be found by going right down the hill from the Forest of Felicity and down to the end of the Brook of Bliss' stream.
